Package uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameScreen
    The GameScreen is the screen, where the main action takes place.
    MapScreen
    Abstract class for almost every screen, that will be used in our PacManGame.
    MenuScreen
    The MenuScreen is the first screen you will see when inside the game.
    PauseScreen
    The PauseScreen is shown when the game gets paused.
    ScoreScreen
    The ScoreScreen is an extension of the MapScreen class, and it's there to present the current high-scores that are stored on your device.
    SettingsScreen
    In the SettingsScreen you can edit your settings or view the scoreboard and the credits.
    SplashScreen
    The SplashScreen is the first thing shown when the application starts.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MapScreen.Type
